thread.title: Google adds virtual assistant to Android Wear watches
thread.title_full: Google adds virtual assistant to Android Wear watches

title: Google adds virtual assistant to Android Wear watches
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Google adds virtual assistant to Android Wear watches 8 February 2017 Last updated at 18:32 GMT Google has revealed a new version of its smartwatch operating system Android Wear - its first major upgrade since 2014. 
The BBC's Chris Foxx asked Google's David Singleton whether the new features, which include a voice-activated assistant, would convince more people to adopt wearable gadgets.
